name: Lode Runner Clone for Commodore PET
name_original: Lode Runner Clone for Commodore PET
description: Lode Runner was an amazing game .. and available on pretty much every major 8-bit platform except for the Commodore PET. Forty years on, I took a crack at creating Lode Runner Clone for the PET and here it is. Tested on PET/CBM models 3032, 4032 and 8032.
